tool_description: Suggests ingredient quantity adjustments to optimize recipe nutritional profile while maintaining taste and texture balance.

maintain_ratios.description: Ingredient indices to maintain current ratios

max_change_percent.description: Maximum percentage change allowed per ingredient

error_messages: Array length mismatch: ingredient_names and current_quantities_g must have the same length.
Invalid optimization goal: Use one of [increase-protein, reduce-sodium, increase-fiber, reduce-calories, balance-macros].
Invalid quantities: All ingredient quantities must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Invalid change limit: max_change_percent must be between 5 and 50 percent.
Insufficient ingredients: At least 2 ingredients required for optimization.
Invalid ratio indices: maintain_ratios indices must correspond to valid ingredient positions.
usage: Provide ingredient_names, current_quantities_g, and optimization_goal. Optionally specify maintain_ratios and max_change_percent. Returns optimized ingredient quantities and expected nutritional improvements.

optimized_quantities_g.description: Recommended quantities in grams after optimization

warnings.description: Warnings about potential taste or texture impacts
